mapper.select: select * from (select pd.dict_id,pd.dict_name,pd.dict_code,pd.name_pinyin,pd.name_jianpin, pd.remark,pd.dicttype_id,pd.order_no from P_DICTIONARY pd where pd.dicttype_id=#{dicttype_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pd.IS_DELETED=0 order by dbms_random.value) where rownum=1
select* from p_dictionary pd inner join P_DOC_CONF pdc on pd.dict_code=pdc.doc_type_code where pdc.id_=#{docid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pd.is_deleted='0'
